articles.description: South Africa's Greg Minnaar won his fourth World Downhill Championship at the age of 39 on Sunday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tiger Brands becomes latest SA company to exit Nigeria - News24
articles.description: South Africa's Tiger Brands has agreed to sell its 49% minority shareholding in UAC Foods to parent UAC of Nigeria.
